name: Robot Battle 3D Simulator
description:
Robot Battle 3D Simulator - Always wanted to go inside the robot? Walk through the city robot in the first person! Imagine that you are a robot. You all fear. You are strong and powerful.
Choose a robot that will look for competitors to manage! Destroy, blow up cars and motorcycles, and office buildings.
Will appeal to all, show your friends and play together! Play off-line and is completely free! Play for combat and intelligent robot. Be careful with mechanical parts! When will end with an urgent need to find a fuel charge!
Become the best of the best combat vehicles in a new unique 3D city!
Thank you for playing with us, leave a comment and we will consider it in the update!
